amendment.description: To make certain improvements to the bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5116 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5116 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR 9/29/2006 S10796; text: CR 9/29/2006 S10796) To make certain improvements to the bill.
